name: lunar riot shotgun (vacuum mode)
description: The "Boudou Sandanjou" is an revolving LDC auto shotgun.  This belongs to an intermediate technological tier, consisting of human devices adapted with weaponized Lunarian tech as noted by the extremely wide and otherwise unwieldy barrel.  The weapon has two modes: normal shotgun operation, and blast mode.  Currently set as blast mode, the action mechanism generates vacuum inside the barrel, causing powerful short-ranged blasts after pulling the trigger.  Switching between modes is done by activating a button in the thumbhole.

use_action.msg: You switch between modes, allowing your weapon to shoot proyectiles.

name: lunar riot shotgun (shot mode)
description: The "Boudou Sandanjou" is an revolving LDC auto shotgun.  This belongs to an intermediate technological tier, consisting of human devices adapted with weaponized Lunarian tech as noted by the extremely wide and otherwise unwieldy barrel.  The weapon has two modes: normal shotgun operation, and blast mode.  Currently set as shotgun mode, the action mechanism works somewhat similar to any human-crafted shotgun.  Switching between modes is done by activating a button in the thumbhole.

name: lunar scouting rifle
description: The "Chakuriku Gyokuto" is a modular bolt-action LDC rifle.  Like other Lunarian pattern guns, this is based on an old human firearm, fabricated and upgraded with Lunarian technology.  Intended to be used by scouting and first wave forces, it's characterized by it's relatively compact size and the modular nature of its parts.

name: lunar handheld artillery
description: The "Suitou Taihou" is a handheld LDC artillery device.  This belongs to an intermediate technological tier, consisting of human devices adapted with weaponized Lunarian tech as noted by the extreme miniaturization done in order to fabricate what can be resumed as a personal cannon.  It's loaded by unscrewing the handle on top, making it look very similar to a thermos.
//: 9 * 30 cm thermos, the barrel is ~25 cm long

description: The "WIP" is a automatic LDC rifle.  This is an example of weaponized Lunarian tech given a container, shaped like a firearm for better handling.  It's characterized by the somewhat wide, long barrel featuring a seven-pointed, star-shaped straight grooves.  The action mechanism's inner workings are not identified.
//: Similar shape as the Mk47 Mutant, the barrel is fully metallic, longer and thiner

description: The "WIP" is a semi-automatic LDC rifle.  This is an example of weaponized Lunarian tech given a container, shaped like a firearm for better handling.  It looks indistinguishable from any battle rifle when first observed, once opened it reveals intrincated, overlapping mechanisms moving back and forth in the same space.

The "WIP" is a semi-automatic LDC rifle.  This is an example of weaponized Lunarian tech given a container, shaped like a firearm for better handling.  Similar in shape to a service carbine, except for the reduced proportions, as if it was scaled down during production.   The normal barrel is short at first glance, yet the action mechanism is both empty and helds more space than the entire weapon.  Weirdly enough, the trigger can be set in two different positions, without any noticeable effects.
//2: Caltrop gun, anti-shoggoth, check ammo description

description: The "WIP" is an automatic interpreter LDC rifle.  This is an example of weaponized Lunarian tech, given a container in the shape of a weapon for better handling in the field.  The mechanism "reads" the ammo data, generates the 5-dimensional bullet component inside and propels it through the barrel, which looks like a solid rod from a 3-dimensional point of view.  The weapon's frame enables attaching a special side module that grants special effects to the ammo.  The overall look with soft curves can only be described as snug.
//: 'generates' used liberally here: each ofuda has the 'bullet' component stored and is consumed in the process of the release, leaving it as a blank piece of paper
//2: Modules should allow trippy stuff: changing damage to elemental types, having a chance to not consume ammo, cc the target at the cost of a chunk of damage, extra pain to the target, etc

description: The "WIP" is a special operations semi-auto LDC SMG.  The weapon looks very compact, with intrincated, bright linear branching designs engraved all over it.  It feeds from the user's psychic energy, focusing it on the target to deal damage, analogous to how a magnifying glass is used to converge sunlight, thus being closer to an assisting tool than a proper weapon.
//2: When used by non-Gyokuto it should debuff the user by giving headaches, things like that. When used by non-elite Gyokuto it should consume rnd(1.5-2) times more mana
